traceability.notes: While the plugin provides separate rules and tests for `@story` and `@req` annotations, it fails to fully implement REQ-FUNCTION-DETECTION for the `@req` rule (missing support for non-declaration functions) and has documentation mismatches. Therefore, not all acceptance criteria are met.
